com.sun.tools.visualvm.tools.jmx
Class CachedMBeanServerConnectionFactory

java.lang.Object
  com.sun.tools.visualvm.tools.jmx.CachedMBeanServerConnectionFactory

public final class CachedMBeanServerConnectionFactory
extends Object

The CachedMBeanServerConnectionFactory class is a factory class that allows to get instances of CachedMBeanServerConnection for a given MBeanServerConnection or JmxModel.

The factory methods allow to supply an interval value at which the cache will be automatically flushed and interested MBeanCacheListeners notified.

If the factory methods which do not take an interval value are used then no automatic flush is performed and the user will be in charge of flushing the cache by calling MBeanCacheOperations.flush().

Author:
Eamonn McManus, Luis-Miguel Alventosa

Method Detail

getCachedMBeanServerConnection

public static CachedMBeanServerConnection getCachedMBeanServerConnection(MBeanServerConnection mbsc)

Factory method for obtaining the CachedMBeanServerConnection for the given MBeanServerConnection.

Parameters:
mbsc - an MBeanServerConnection.
Returns:
a CachedMBeanServerConnection instance which caches the attribute values of the supplied MBeanServerConnection.

getCachedMBeanServerConnection

public static CachedMBeanServerConnection getCachedMBeanServerConnection(MBeanServerConnection mbsc,
                                                                         int interval)
                                                                  throws IllegalArgumentException

Factory method for obtaining the CachedMBeanServerConnection for the given MBeanServerConnection. The cache will be flushed at the given interval and the interested MBeanCacheListeners will be notified.

Parameters:
mbsc - an MBeanServerConnection.
interval - the interval (in milliseconds) at which the cache is flushed. An interval equal to zero means no automatic flush of the MBean cache.
Returns:
a CachedMBeanServerConnection instance which caches the attribute values of the supplied MBeanServerConnection and is flushed at the end of every interval period.
Throws:
IllegalArgumentException - if the supplied interval is negative.

getCachedMBeanServerConnection

public static CachedMBeanServerConnection getCachedMBeanServerConnection(JmxModel jmx)

Factory method for obtaining the CachedMBeanServerConnection for the given JmxModel.

Parameters:
jmx - a JmxModel.
Returns:
a CachedMBeanServerConnection instance which caches the attribute values of the supplied JmxModel.

getCachedMBeanServerConnection

public static CachedMBeanServerConnection getCachedMBeanServerConnection(JmxModel jmx,
                                                                         int interval)
                                                                  throws IllegalArgumentException

Factory method for obtaining the CachedMBeanServerConnection for the given JmxModel. The cache will be flushed at the given interval and the interested MBeanCacheListeners will be notified.

Parameters:
jmx - a JmxModel.
interval - the interval (in milliseconds) at which the cache is flushed. An interval equal to zero means no automatic flush of the MBean cache.
Returns:
a CachedMBeanServerConnection instance which caches the attribute values of the supplied JmxModel and is flushed at the end of every interval period.
Throws:
IllegalArgumentException - if the supplied interval is negative.
